data.title: Downey Jr Wins Oscar For 'Oppenheimer,' 31 Years After First Nod
data.meta_description: Robert Downey, Jr on Sunday won his first Academy Award, a best supporting actor statuette for his villainous turn in "Oppenheimer" -- a golden moment in a decades-long career of highs and lows, on and off the screen.

Downey Jr Wins Oscar For 'Oppenheimer,' 31 Years After First Nod

Robert Downey, Jr on Sunday won his first Academy Award, a best supporting actor statuette for his villainous turn in "Oppenheimer" -- a golden moment in a decades-long career of highs and lows, on and off the screen.
